about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE GRAPEVINE INN!

Peachleaf Valley: Duke's Story is the first DLC content release for "Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love" featuring Duke, The Doctor, as a new romanceable bachelor!

It features the story and the ability to romance Duke, the town's retired doctor turned innkeeper and the heart behind The Grapevine Inn—a warm, welcoming haven in Peachleaf Valley.🌿🍷

Duke's Story brings a blend of romance and comedy as we explore themes of found family, repairing broken connections, and the hilariously charming dynamics between Duke, his mischievous daughter, Melody, and Giuseppe, a witty wine extraordinaire who has just moved to the valley as Duke’s newest rival! 🍇✨

  • Interactive Romance – Unlock Duke’s exclusive Navigation Menu, packed with interactive scenes and choices that shape your relationship with the charming innkeeper.

  • Captivating (Optional) Animations – Immerse yourself in expressive animations that bring Duke and his world to life, making each encounter more heartfelt and memorable. With our customizable accessibility menu, you can tailor animations to suit your preferences, ensuring an experience as immersive—or streamlined—as you’d like. Craft your ideal playthrough and enjoy Peachleaf Valley your way!

  • Beautiful Background Illustrations – Explore hand-drawn backgrounds capturing the cozy charm of The Grapevine Inn and other scenic spots around Peachleaf Valley.

  • Unforgettable CG Moments – Collect stunning, high-quality CGs that highlight key romantic scenes with Duke, crafted to be savored and revisited.

  • Partial Voice Acting – Enjoy performances by professional voice actors that add depth and personality to Duke and the cast, drawing you even closer to the story.

  • New Music Tracks – Experience exclusive new music that perfectly complements the atmosphere of Peachleaf Valley—from warm, gentle melodies to lighthearted tunes.

  • AND Exclusive New Characters and Locations to explore in the Valley!

fullgame.name: Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love - a farming inspired otome
